WorkItem.Description: There was a bug where I was doing the work on a per-shot basis, but the final mitigation math was taking the initial IncPhysicalDamage value. This meant that things like Blade Barrier was doing nothing for the calculations.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Mitigation was not properly accounting for DamageReductionMultiplier
